鄝字的基本解释

鄝
liǎo
中国春秋时国名（ａ．在今河南省唐河县境；ｂ．在今河南省固始县境）。

鄝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liǎo］
［《廣韻》盧鳥切，上篠，來。］
舒鄝，古国名。在今安徽省庐江县西南。

鄝字的康熙字典解释

【酉集下】【邑字部】　鄝； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页1276第26
【唐韻】盧鳥切【集韻】【韻會】朗鳥切【正韻】盧皎切，?音了。國名。【穀梁傳·宣八年】楚人滅舒鄝。【左傳·桓十一年】鄖人軍于蒲騷，將與隨、絞、州、蓼伐楚師。【註】蓼國，今義陽棘陽縣東南湖陽城。蓼與鄝同。

鄝字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
鄝字的起名意思

暂无。

鄝
Basic explanation of words
鄝
liǎo
The name of the country in the Spring and Autumn Period of China (a. in the border of Tanghe County in Henan Province; b. in the border of Gushi County in Henan Province).
鄝
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liǎo］
["Guangyun" Lu Niaoqie, Shangxiao, come. ]
Shu Juan, the name of an ancient country. In the southwest of Lujiang County, Anhui Province today.
鄝
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 2] [Yi Zi Department] 　鄝; Kangxi strokes: 18; page number: page 1276 26
[Tang Yun] Lu Niaoqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Lang Niaoqie [Zheng Yun] Lu Jiaoqie, the sound is gone. Country names. [Guliang Chuan·Xuan 8th year] Chu people destroyed Shu Juan. [Zuo Zhuan·Han Eleventh Year] The Yun Renjun was in Pusao, and would join Sui, Jiao, Zhou, and Liao against the Chu division. [Note] Polygonum, now Huyang City, Southeast of Jiyang County, Yiyang. Polygonum and Mo are the same.
鄝
Source glyph

鄝
Name meaning
Nothing.
liào
собств. ист. Ляо (назв. княжества в эпоху Чуньцю на территории нынешней пров. Хэнань)
